description: Achievements are a type of crawler notification generated and distributed by the System AI as crawlers progress through the Dungeon. Most achievements reward crawlers for playing the game with Loot Boxes, but some achievements serve to warn crawlers of impending danger, notify crawlers that they're on the wrong track, or even nudge crawlers to remember particular tactics or information.
name: Achievement
rules_text: Achievements reward crawlers with various rewards as they progress through the game.
